ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge,defaults
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-comp7
zip_keys:
- - cdt_name
  - docker_image

about.description:
hasasia is a Python package for calculating and building accurate PTA
sensitivity curves.This software is designed for use by astronomers
interested in sources of nanohertz gravitational waves and PTA data
analysts alike.
about.summary: A Python package to calculate gravitational-wave sensitivity curves for pulsar timing arrays.

about.description:
hasasia is a Python package for calculating and building accurate PTA
sensitivity curves.This software is designed for use by astronomers
interested in sources of nanohertz gravitational waves and PTA data
analysts alike.
about.summary: A Python package to calculate gravitational-wave sensitivity curves for pulsar timing arrays.

name: hasasia
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "hasasia" %}
{% set version = "1.2.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 87ab202bb6c07b24922169fc12115f9fe074c9d6ae33df08b91cb3c4ca48436f

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python >=3.5
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=3.5
    - numpy >=1.14
    - scipy >=1.0
    - astropy >=3.0

test:
  imports:
    - hasasia
    - hasasia.sensitivity
    - hasasia.skymap
    - hasasia.sim
    - hasasia.utils
  requires:
    - pip
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/Hazboun6/hasasia
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'A Python package to calculate gravitational-wave sensitivity curves for pulsar timing arrays.'
  description: |
    hasasia is a Python package for calculating and building accurate PTA
    sensitivity curves.This software is designed for use by astronomers
    interested in sources of nanohertz gravitational waves and PTA data
    analysts alike.
  doc_url: https://hasasia.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/Hazboun6/hasasia

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - Hazboun6
